text:
Both of the UAE dial variants came in a variety of the 7177 finishes.
Interestingly, a small batch of circa ~25 watches featuring gold-colored
cases were produced.

There is a very small batch of casebacks in which the serial number's
location shifted to the middle of the caseback. This is found on UAE
issued examples, in the low ~3000 serial range.

The 7177 UAE variant was ordered by the UAE’s Air Force and came in
two dial variations:

list.title: Mk. 1 Dial:
list.text:
Stamped with “UAE AIR FORCE” at four o'clock and a tricolor
motif at the six o’clock subdial.

list.title: Mk. 2 Dial:
list.text:
Stamped with “UAE AIR FORCE” at four o'clock as well, but
“CENTRAL AIR BASE" stamped at the six o’clock subdial instead of a
motif.
